sentences.en: After a three-weekend courtship, Pamela accepted Randolph's proposal of marriage.
sentences.cn: 经过3个周末的追求之后，帕梅拉接受了伦道夫的求婚。

sentences.en: After sixteen years of marriage they have grown bored with each other.
sentences.cn: 结婚16年后，他们已经渐渐彼此厌倦了。

sentences.en: Eventually Sam persuaded her to accept an offer of marriage.
sentences.cn: 最终萨姆说服她接受了求婚。

sentences.en: he asked my father for my &B{hand in marriage}.
sentences.cn: 他请求我父亲把我嫁给他。

sentences.en: He must have been aware that my parents' marriage was breaking up.
sentences.cn: 他一定已经知道我父母的婚姻即将破裂。

sentences.en: Her marriage to film producer Michael Greenburg fell apart.
sentences.cn: 她和电影制片人迈克尔·格林伯格的婚姻破裂了。

sentences.en: I'll make this marriage work if it kills me.
sentences.cn: 再难我也要努力使这桩婚姻幸福美满。

sentences.en: Mahler was also known for his passionate involvements outside marriage.
sentences.cn: 马勒也因为其轰轰烈烈的婚外情而出名。

sentences.en: Mr Olaechea has British residency by virtue of his marriage.
sentences.cn: 奥拉伊奇先生通过结婚而取得在英国的永久居留权。

sentences.en: She has three daughters from a previous marriage.
sentences.cn: 她前一次婚姻生了三个女儿。

sentences.en: She still ached for the lost intimacy and sexual contact of marriage.
sentences.cn: 她仍旧渴望拥有婚姻中逝去的那份缱绻和肌肤之亲。

sentences.en: The couple hold the unfashionable view that marriage is a sacred union.
sentences.cn: 夫妇俩对婚姻的看法很传统，认为婚姻是神圣的结合。

sentences.en: The couple laughed off rumours that their marriage was in trouble.
sentences.cn: 夫妻两人对他们婚姻出现问题的谣言一笑置之。

sentences.en: the estate passed by marriage to the Burlingtons.
sentences.cn: 通过婚姻财产传给了伯林顿家族。

sentences.en: The marriage took place at St Bartholomew’s Church.
sentences.cn: 婚礼是在圣巴托罗缪教堂举行的。

sentences.en: The state of their marriage has been put into the public domain.
sentences.cn: 他们的婚姻状况已公开。

sentences.en: Their marriage is getting a little frayed around the edges.
sentences.cn: 他们的婚姻开始出现裂痕。

sentences.en: While slogging at work, have you neglected your marriage?
sentences.cn: 埋头工作的时候，你是否忽视了自己的婚姻？

sentences.en: Wives will have to bring along their marriage certificate.
sentences.cn: 已婚妇女必须携带结婚证。

words.tran_cn: 已婚的，有配偶的；婚姻的，夫妇的；密切结合的

phrases.tran_cn: 通过婚姻（而形成或得到）
公证结婚；世俗婚礼；非宗教仪式婚姻
（婚前预定财产权，继承权等的）结婚契约
满足相互利益的结合，权宜婚姻
买卖婚姻；着眼实利的婚姻

trans.tran_en: the relationship between two people who are married, or the state of being married
